S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-5533 Client differs from embedded when rs.updateInt overflows: 22015 vs 22003
Patch derby-5533b. Changes the client driver to throw SQL state 22003 as does the embedded driver. Also adds tests for over- and underflow conditions with ResultSet#updateXXX and ResultSet#getXXX, which were seen to be lacking in our coverage.
